alert.note: Alert for Leake (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 28 at 8:31PM CDT until March 29 at 2:44PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Mississippi... Pearl River Near Columbia affecting Marion County. Yazoo River At Yazoo City affecting Yazoo County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi...Louisiana... Pearl River At Edinburg affecting Leake County. Big Black River Near Bovina affecting Warren and Hinds Counties. Pearl River Near Carthage affecting Leake County. Pearl River Near Rockport affecting Copiah and Simpson Counties. Pearl River Near Monticello affecting Lawrence County. Big Black River Near Bentonia affecting Madison and Yazoo Counties. Big Black River At West affecting Holmes and Attala Counties. Mississippi River At Natchez affecting Wilkinson, Concordia and Adams Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TUESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Pearl River At Edinburg. * WHEN...Until Tuesday afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 PM CDT Monday the stage was 20.1 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:45 PM CDT Monday was 21.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage this evening and continue falling to 15.4 feet Saturday evening. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu Pearl River Edinburg 20.0 20.1 Mon 7 pm CDT 18.7 17.4 16.5 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued Tuesday morning at 830 AM CDT.
